meanings.definition: A rare hydrated lead manganese antimonate mineral with formula Mn2+Pb8(OH)10(SbO4)4.
meanings.english_definition: A rare hydrated lead manganese antimonate mineral with formula Mn2+Pb8(OH)10(SbO4)4.

etymology.value: From Ancient Greek πῦρ (pûr, “fire”), Ancient Greek βέλος (bélos, “dart, arrow”), and lead.
